Models¶

This section treats the different models that have been implemented as of now.

Models summary

u8timeseries.Arima([p, d, q])

u8timeseries.AutoArima([start_p, max_p, …])

u8timeseries.AutoRegressiveModel()

This is a base class for various implementation of uni-variate time series forecasting models These models predict future values of one time series using no other data.

u8timeseries.ExponentialSmoothing([trend, …])

u8timeseries.KthValueAgoBaseline([K])

A baseline model that always predict value of K time steps ago E.g., always predict last observed value when K=1, or last year value with K=12 (on monthly data)

u8timeseries.Prophet([weekly_seasonality, …])

u8timeseries.StandardRegressiveModel(…[, …])

AutoRegressiveModel¶

class u8timeseries.AutoRegressiveModel[source]¶

This is a base class for various implementation of uni-variate time series forecasting models These models predict future values of one time series using no other data.

Methods Summary

predict(n)

A TimeSeries containing the n next points, starting after the end of the training time series.

KthValueAgoBaseline¶

class u8timeseries.KthValueAgoBaseline(K=1)[source]¶

Bases: u8timeseries.models.autoregressive_model.AutoRegressiveModel

A baseline model that always predict value of K time steps ago E.g., always predict last observed value when K=1, or last year value with K=12 (on monthly data)
